title: Add validation middleware
description:
Implement validation middleware for todo data.

Requirements:
- Validate POST /todos request body:
  - title: required, string, min 1 char, max 100 chars
  - description: optional, string, max 500 chars
  - completed: optional, boolean (defaults to false)
- Validate PUT /todos/:id request body:
  - title: optional, string, min 1 char, max 100 chars
  - description: optional, string, max 500 chars
  - completed: optional, boolean
- Return 400 Bad Request with error details for invalid data

Acceptance Criteria:
- Validation middleware created and applied to routes
- Invalid requests return 400 with clear error messages
- Valid requests pass through to route handlers
- Edge cases handled (empty body, wrong types)
